mapper.select: select * from (select i.INQ_NO,i.INQ_TITLE,i.INQ_NOTE,i.INQ_REF,i.INQ_WRITEDATE,i.INQ_STEP,s.SPACE_NO,s.SPACE_NAME,m.MEM_NAME,m.MEM_NO,s.MEM_NO HOST from INQUIRE i inner join SPACE s on i.SPACE_NO = s.SPACE_NO inner join MEMBER m on i.mem_no = m.mem_no) k inner join MEMBER m1 on k.HOST = m1.MEM_NO order by inq_ref DESC, inq_step ASC

select count(*) from (select i.INQ_NO,i.INQ_TITLE,i.INQ_NOTE,i.INQ_REF,i.INQ_WRITEDATE,i.INQ_STEP,s.SPACE_NO,s.SPACE_NAME,m.MEM_NAME,m.MEM_NO,s.MEM_NO HOST from INQUIRE i inner join SPACE s on i.SPACE_NO = s.SPACE_NO inner join MEMBER m on i.mem_no = m.mem_no) k inner join MEMBER m1 on k.HOST = m1.MEM_NO order by inq_ref DESC, inq_step ASC

select * from (select i.INQ_NO,i.INQ_TITLE,i.INQ_NOTE,i.INQ_REF,i.INQ_WRITEDATE,i.INQ_STEP,s.SPACE_NO,s.SPACE_NAME,m.MEM_NAME,m.MEM_NO,s.MEM_NO HOST from INQUIRE i inner join SPACE s on i.SPACE_NO = s.SPACE_NO inner join MEMBER m on i.mem_no =m.mem_no) k inner join member m1 on k.HOST = m1.mem_no where inq_no=#{inqNo}
mapper.update: update inquire set inq_title = #{inq_title}, inq_note = #{inq_note} where inq_no = #{inq_no}
update inquire set inq_step=inq_step+1 where inq_ref=#{inq_ref} and inq_step > #{inq_step}
